mapper.sql: PKID, CASE_CODE, PART_CODE, PR_CAT, PR_APPLIANT, PR_EXECUTOR, PR_APPLY_TIME, PR_ACCPET_TIME, PR_COMPLETE_TIME, PR_STATUS, PR_CHANNEL,IS_SUCCESS,PR_CODE,same_Pr_Code,pr_District_Id,UNSUCCESS_REASON,pr_Apply_Org_Id,pr_Apply_Org_Name,pr_Cost_Org_Id,pr_Cost_Org_Name pr_Cost_Org_Mgr,pr_Address,create_Time,create_By,update_Time,update_By,dist_Code
mapper.select: select res.PKID, res.CASE_CODE, res.PART_CODE, PR_CAT, PR_APPLIANT, PR_EXECUTOR, PR_APPLY_TIME, PR_ACCPET_TIME, res.PR_CODE,same_Pr_Code,pr_District_Id, PR_COMPLETE_TIME, PR_STATUS, PR_CHANNEL,IS_SUCCESS from sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_RESEARCH res where datediff(day,res.PR_APPLY_TIME,getdate())=0 and res.pr_Address=#{0} and res.pr_cat=#{1} and res.same_pr_code is null
mapper.insert: insert into sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_RESEARCH (PKID, CASE_CODE, PART_CODE, PR_CAT, PR_APPLIANT, PR_EXECUTOR, PR_APPLY_TIME, PR_ACCPET_TIME, PR_COMPLETE_TIME, PR_STATUS, PR_CHANNEL,PR_CODE,SAME_PR_CODE,UPDATE_BY,UPDATE_TIME) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prCat,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{prAppliant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prExecutor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prApplyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{prAccpetTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{prCompleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{prStatus,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{prChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{samePRCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},@{SESSION_USER_ID},GETDATE())

insert into sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_RESEARCH
PKID,
CASE_CODE,
PART_CODE,
PR_CAT,
PR_APPLIANT,
PR_EXECUTOR,
PR_APPLY_TIME,
PR_ACCPET_TIME,
PR_COMPLETE_TIME,
PR_STATUS,
PR_CHANNEL,
same_Pr_Code,
pr_District_Id,
Pr_Code ,
pr_Apply_Org_Id ,
pr_Apply_Org_Name ,
pr_Cost_Org_Id ,
pr_Cost_Org_Name ,
pr_Cost_Org_Mgr ,
pr_Address ,
create_Time ,
create_By ,
UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME,
dist_Code ,
#{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{partCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{prCat,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
#{prAppliant,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{prExecutor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{prApplyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{prAccpetTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{prCompleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{prStatus,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
#{prChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{samePRCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{prDistrictId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{prCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{prApplyOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{prApplyOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{prCostOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{prCostOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{prCostOrgMgr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{prAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
@{SESSION_USER_ID}, GETDATE(),
#{distCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_RESEARCH
CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PART_CODE = #{partCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PR_CAT = #{prCat,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
PR_APPLIANT = #{prAppliant,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PR_EXECUTOR = #{prExecutor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PR_APPLY_TIME = #{prApplyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PR_ACCPET_TIME = #{prAccpetTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PR_COMPLETE_TIME = #{prCompleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PR_STATUS = #{prStatus,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
PR_CHANNEL = #{prChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PR_CODE = #{prCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SAME_PR_CODE= #{samePRCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_Success= #{isSuccess,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unSuccess_Reason= #{unSuccessReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pr_Apply_Org_Id= #{prApplyOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pr_Apply_Org_Name= #{prApplyOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pr_Cost_Org_Id= #{prCostOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pr_Cost_Org_Name= #{prCostOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pr_Cost_Org_Mgr= #{prCostOrgMgr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pr_Address= #{prAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_Time= #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_By= #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PR_DISTRICT_ID = #{prDistrictId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_BY = @{SESSION_USER_ID}, UPDATE_TIME = GETDATE(),
dist_Code= #{distCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_RESEARCH set CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PART_CODE = #{partCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PR_CODE = #{prCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PR_CAT = #{prCat,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, PR_APPLIANT = #{prAppliant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PR_EXECUTOR = #{prExecutor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PR_APPLY_TIME = #{prApplyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PR_ACCPET_TIME = #{prAccpetTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PR_COMPLETE_TIME = #{prCompleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PR_STATUS = #{prStatus,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, PR_CHANNEL = #{prChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SAME_PR_CODE= #{samePRCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_BY = @{SESSION_USER_ID}, UPDATE_TIME = GETDATE() where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_RESEARCH set PR_STATUS = 1 where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_RESEARCH set PR_STATUS = 2 where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_RESEARCH set PR_ACCPET_TIME = GETDATE() where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_RESEARCH set PR_COMPLETE_TIME = GETDATE() where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT A.pr_Address AS propertyAddr FROM sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_RESEARCH AS A WHERE A.PKID =#{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select
from sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_RESEARCH where CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PR_STATUS <> 2

select
from sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_RESEARCH where 1=1 AND CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DateDiff(dd,PR_APPLY_TIME,getdate())=0 AND SAME_PR_CODE IS NULL

select
from sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_RESEARCH where 1=1 AND DateDiff(dd,PR_APPLY_TIME,getdate())=0 AND CASE_CODE IS NULL AND SAME_PR_CODE IS NULL
select * FROM sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_RESEARCH AS A WHERE A.SAME_PR_CODE IS NULL and A.PR_STATUS='0' and A.PR_DISTRICT_ID = #{prDistrictId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_RESEARCH set PR_STATUS = 1,PR_ACCPET_TIME = GETDATE() WHERE SAME_PR_CODE IS NULL and PR_STATUS='0' and PR_DISTRICT_ID = #{prDistrictId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select AH.REAL_NAME as QUDS from sctrans.T_SYS_ORG_HIERARCHY AS OH LEFT JOIN sctrans.V_USER_ORG_JOB AS AH on AH.ORG_id = OH.BUSIWZ_ID AND AH.job_code = 'JQYDS' AND AH.is_leader = 1 where OH.org_id=#{0}
select max(uoj.ORG_ID) from sctrans.SYS_USER_ORG_JOB as uoj where uoj.USER_ID=#{0};
